name: Gates of Steem
description:
Controls: a-d / arrows for movement, mouse for attack (left click small, right click big attack), space for jump.

Hey Steemians!

gates of steem is a steemmonsters themed RPG with Steemit integration, which means you can make an impact on gameplay on steemit by commenting and voting! The links to do that are included in the game.

I have created this game for the occasion of the steemmonsters game jam. The current version is on a prototype level and demonstrates:

  • animated steemmonsters
  • basic gameplay mechanics (attacks, HP, mana)
  • steem reading integration -> events are linked to steem posts!

Good luck and have fun!

Any advice is welcome!

Cheers,
Phonebox
